translation: According to the Shiyao zhuangyan jing (T.1:161b16–16), the stars corresponding to the three walls of the market and the constellations in the upper part of the sky are listed as being located at the northern end of the day.

translation: The water stars (the essence of water is black in color, its nature and wisdom are always shining at the four seasons, and when the land is rich and the people are happy and not depressed, the water drought becomes [海-母+小].)
